text.jpText: 最高の[感覚]<とき> ただ求めては
text.enText: Only desiring the [moments]<time> you feel the best

text.jpText: 羨望の渦の中 立ち向かうと決めた
text.enText: Means you have decided to  Face the center of the vortex of envy

text.jpText: 覚悟は手放さない リスクはいつも
text.enText: I won't ever let go of my resolve  Because I just noticed that

text.jpText: ギリギリでパワーになる
text.enText: Risk turns to power at the last moment

text.jpText: そう気づいたの
text.enText: It always had

text.jpText: 情熱に焦がされて 見えなくなった時も
text.enText: There were times I've been burned intensely  And times where I couldn't see a thing

text.jpText: 夢の声 導かれ 私は行くの…
text.enText: But I'll move forward  Cause I'm guided by  The voices of my dreams…

text.jpText: 誰より今 強く駆け抜けたら
text.enText: If I ran pass through all  My opponents and start taking the lead

text.jpText: 一番先で笑顔になれる
text.enText: I'm the one that could make a smile first, you'll see

text.jpText: 本能スピード 熱く身体を滾ってく
text.enText: My Instinctual Speed  Scorchingly fills my body with this feeling

text.jpText: もう何も恐れないで
text.enText: No, I do not have anything left to fear

text.jpText: 限界なんて必要ないの
text.enText: Limits, I don't need them anymore

text.jpText: 最速の私になって
text.enText: The fastest version that I will become

text.jpText: 見果てぬ世界 越えてゆけ
text.enText: Will even surpass the world

text.enText: If I ran pass through all  My opponents and start taking the lead
